about.title: About
about.content: What started with curiosity became a journey into intelligent machines and real-world AI. I build things that can understand, predict, and act — from language models to sensor-driven robots. My goal? Make smart tech useful.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content:
Programming Languages: Python, C/C++, SQL, JavaScript

Backend Development: FastAPI, Node.js (basic); REST APIs (JWT Authentication, OAuth2); GraphQL (API design & optimization)

Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite; Redis (caching, async job queues)

Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning
- Frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn
- Algorithms: XGBoost, Random Forest, SVM, Clustering
- Deep Learning: CNNs, RNNs, GANs, Transfer Learning
- Model Optimization & Serving: ONNX, TorchServe, TensorFlow Serving

Natural Language Processing (NLP)
- Hugging Face Transformers, GPT, LLaMA, Mistral
- Sentence Transformers (SBERT), RAG Pipelines (LangChain + FAISS)
- Vector Databases: Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus
- Applications: Summarization, Sentiment Analysis, Question Answering

Computer Vision
- OpenCV, Tesseract OCR, MediaPipe
- Object Detection, Image Segmentation, Face Recognition & Swapping
- Whisper (speech-to-text), AR-DMS project

Data Science & Analytics
- Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn
- Jupyter, Colab
- EDA, Feature Engineering
- Tools: pdfplumber, PyMuPDF

Testing & Quality Assurance
- Pytest, unittest
- Test-Driven Development (TDD)
- CI/CD integrated testing pipelines

DevOps & MLOps
- Containers & Orchestration: Docker, Docker Compose, Kubernetes
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins (basic)
- Model Lifecycle: MLflow, DVC
- Monitoring & Logging: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack
- Architecture: Microservices, Serverless

Cloud & Deployment
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda basics), GCP (basic), Azure (intro)
- Vercel (portfolio/frontend deployment)
- Streamlit (ML app demos)
- Infrastructure as Code: Terraform

Automation & AI Agents
- n8n (workflow automation)
- LangChain Agents + MCP integration
- AutoGen, CrewAI (multi-agent frameworks)

Collaboration & Project Management
- Git, GitHub, GitHub Projects
- Jira, Trello, Confluence
- Postman (API testing), VS Code, PyCharm

projects.title: AI-Powered Real-Time Trading & Analytics Platform (Moneyverse)
projects.content: FastAPI + Streamlit real-time trading system with WebSocket-powered live market updates, interactive dashboard, and an in-app AI trading assistant chatbot. Integrates market/news APIs, PostgreSQL, and Docker. Tech: FastAPI, Streamlit, WebSockets, LLM Chatbot, PostgreSQL, Docker.

projects.title: AI Research & Decision System (AR-DMS)
projects.content: Full-stack AI assistant capable of parsing PDFs, web pages, and images using OCR, NLP, and semantic search. Supports RAG-based querying, summarization, and decision support. Tech: FastAPI, LangChain, Hugging Face, FAISS, PyMuPDF, Tesseract.

projects.title: Material Estimation from Architectural PDFs
projects.content: Production-grade AI pipeline to analyze architectural blueprints and extract structured, room-wise material takeoff. Outputs CSV reports with counts and area-based estimations using LLM reasoning. Tech: Groq, LLaMA 3, PyMuPDF, pdfplumber, OCR.

projects.title: HistoriAI – Multilingual Travel Assistant
projects.content: Voice-interactive travel bot offering historical insights in English, Hindi, and Gujarati, powered by LLaMA 3 and LangGraph with a local RAG system and TTS output. Tech: LLaMA 3, LangGraph, ChromaDB, MMS, TTS.

projects.title: Automated LinkedIn Profile Scraper & Business Insights
projects.content: Web scraping system that extracts professional data by filters and classifies businesses using AI. Includes scheduling, proxies, and JSON exports for large-scale insights. Tech: Selenium, SerpAPI, Python, JSON, Web Automation.

projects.title: AI-Powered Text Rewriting System (GPT-4 + SBERT)
projects.content: Advanced few-shot GPT-4-based rewriting tool with SBERT for style and meaning validation. Designed for tone-preserving rephrasing and prompt engineering. Tech: GPT-4 (OpenRouter), SentenceTransformers, Few-shot Learning, SBERT.

projects.title: Robotic Nurse (SSIP Funded – Ongoing)
projects.content: Smart nursing assistant robot for healthcare automation. Delivers medicine and monitors vitals using embedded electronics and BLE communication. Tech: Arduino, IR Sensors, BLE, Embedded C.

projects.title: Robotic Arm (SSIP Funded)
projects.content: Programmable robotic arm designed for precision pick-and-place using Arduino and servo motors. Supports real-time control with industrial scenarios. Tech: Arduino, Servo Motors, Sensors, Embedded Programming.

projects.title: Python-Based Video Downloader API
projects.content: FastAPI wrapper around a video downloading tool that extracts videos by URL. Supports multi-resolution, concurrent downloads, and metadata handling. Tech: Python, FastAPI, yt-dlp, Pydantic.

projects.title: Real-time Face Swapping using Dlib & DeepFaceLive
projects.content: Live face-swapping engine using facial landmarks, deep feature embeddings, and video stream alignment. Combines Dlib and DeepFaceLive for high-precision identity replacement. Tech: Dlib, OpenCV, DeepFaceLive, NumPy.

projects.title: Food Classification & Calorie Estimation
projects.content: ResNet50-based model that classifies food images and estimates calories to aid dietary monitoring. Tech: ResNet50, Keras, TensorFlow, ImageNet, NumPy.

projects.title: Healthcare Billing Data Audit
projects.content: Automated complex healthcare billing audits with anomaly detection, analytics, and report generation for optimization. Tech: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Regex, Python Automation.

projects.title: Cat vs Dog Image Classifier
projects.content: CNN model to distinguish between cat and dog images with high accuracy, with focus on training, validation, and overfitting prevention. Tech: TensorFlow, Keras, CNN, Image Augmentation.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.content: Hybrid recommendation engine combining TF-IDF and SVD-based collaborative filtering for personalized suggestions. Tech: Scikit-learn, Pandas, TF-IDF, SVD, Cosine Similarity.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
projects.content: Clustering to find high-value customer segments based on purchasing behavior, driving 15% growth via targeted marketing. Tech: K-Means, PCA, Seaborn, Scikit-learn, Python.

projects.title: Spam Message Classification
projects.content: NLP-based spam detection using TF-IDF feature extraction and classifiers, achieving high precision and recall. Tech: NLP, TF-IDF, Logistic Regression, Scikit-learn.

resume.title: Resume
resume.note: Download the latest resume from the hero section or ask the bot for a link.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: AI Developer – Upwork (Jun 2025 – Present): Freelance AI Developer specializing in production-ready AI systems. I help businesses turn ideas into scalable solutions by building AI-powered backend infrastructures, integrating Large Language Models, and developing automations that reduce manual work and scale operations. AI/ML Developer – Prodev Infotech (Jan 2025 – Nov 2025): Building and deploying real-time ML pipelines using FastAPI, Hugging Face, and custom LLM integrations. MooRopan INDIA PVT. LTD. (Oct 2022 - May 2023): As a core member, developed engaging content, managed campaigns, and analyzed metrics to enhance brand presence and customer engagement on social media.

certifications.title: Achievements
certifications.content: Winner – Reckon 4.0 National Hackathon. SSIP India – Funding Recipient for Robotic Nurse and Robotic Arm. Regional Finalist – SSIP Hackathon 2022.

faq.a: I build practical AI systems that understand, predict, and act — LLMs, NLP, computer vision, and robotics.
Email me at zinalraval4444@gmail.com or use LinkedIn.

faq.q: Do you have experience with RAG?
faq.a: Yes, multiple RAG projects — AR-DMS and internal assistants using FAISS/Chroma and LangChain.
